title: L'Ukraine abat 16 drones et un missile lors des dernières attaques russes-armée
cleaned_sentences: Kyiv, November 16 (Reuters) - The Ukrainian army has shot down 16 of the 18 attack drones launched by Russia during from the night from Wednesday to Thursday, as well as a missile, said the air force.
Ukrainian air defenses have been activated in the Western region of Khmelnitski, said the governor assistant.
Residents were invited to take shelter as well as in the city of Starokostiiantyniv, where a Airwater base on several occasions by strikes Russian air.
The authorities did not specify where the two fell drones that have escaped their defense system.

According to Ukrainian authorities, S-300 missiles have damaged by civil infrastructure not specified in the Western region of Kharkiv, on the border with Russia, without however reporting victims or injured.
In another declaration, the Ukrainian ministry of energy said Russian shots had targeted power plant in the Donetsk region, in the east of the country, and damaged equipment.
Ukrainians fear new air strikes this winter against their electrical and energy networks, which would cause disturbances and general breakdowns.
(Dan Peleschuk report; French version Dagmarah Mackos, edited by Kate Entringer)
